evidence.text: Person B: Prabha... I... before I go I wanted to ask you... I wanted to see if... there was a reason if... If I should continue to stay here....If there was some reason for me to stay back.
Person A: But doctor... I am married...

Person A: Nowhere... To the end of the line. Where the last tip of Bombay meets the sea.
Person B: I should go... To see it then?
Person A: Yes... I think you will like it... Just keep sitting on the bus and don't get off till you reach the end of the line.
